sentences.sContent: Take a look at the desks around you to see how yours fits in, and bear in mind you can manipulate it to send out a certain message.
sentences.sContent_eng: Take a look at the desks around you to see how yours fits in, and bear in mind you can manipulate it to send out a certain message.
sentences.sCn: 看一下你周围的桌子来判断你的桌面情况有多高合适度，另外要记住你可以通过巧妙处理你的桌面来发出特定信号。
